title: bAla gOpAlanE
sahitya:
bAla gOpAlanE pakSam vaittaruLvAi paramAnanda lIlanE


anupallavi

  jnAlattilE Atma jnAna bhakti karmattAl kOlat-tiru vAzhveida kuzhalisai paraviya


caraNam    vanjanai arakkiyin mAya uyir kuDittAi vAri senra dAnavan pAril vIzha maDittAi
nenjil vandiDar sheyyum venjinaip-pEigaLai nIru sheidun anbil mArillAdirukka shei
